titleStmt.title: A relation of ten years in Europe, Asia, Affrique, and America all by way of letters occasionally written to divers noble personages, from place to place, and continued to this present year / by Richard Fleckno.
titleStmt.author: Flecknoe, Richard, d. 1678?

notesStmt.note: "With divers other historical, moral, and poetical pieces of the same author."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
